p: The Cercopithecus aethiops kidney epithelial cells (Vero E6) were procured from ATCC (CRL-1586) and cultured at standard conditions in Eagle’s Minimum Essential Medium with the supplement of 10% fetal bovine serum at 37 °C. The cells were trypsinized with 0.25% (w/v) Trypsin- 0.53 mM EDTA solution while maintaining the culture.
